name: TheLab (TheRealMaurits)
description:
This game is the first one that I have created in Unreal Engine 5. During the development I wanted to focus mainly on C++ programming. I ended up also using blueprints, since development in Unreal without blueprint is quite hard.

In the game you control a third person character that can select between to different minigames. It is your tasks to win both games and unlock the door to get to the end.
